text: Bayrak () is a rural locality (a village) in Otradovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 188 as of 2010. There are 13 streets. == Geography == It is located 10 km from Sterlitamak, 5 km from Novaya Otradovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Bayrak, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
